title: Pixel 4a Overheat -> Disabled some functions -> Car Bluetooth not recognizing phone anymore
content: Pixel 4a was connected to car bluetooth to play some songs. During the drive, the phone got overheated and notified me that some functions were disabled. I can still connect the phone to the car bluetooth and play songs but the car says the phone is not recognized and no information on the song i am playing shows on the car UI and I can not skip songs.
